stockmarket.model

Interface Portfolio

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PortfolioImpl

    public interface Portfolio
    This interface represents a Portfolio which is a combination of a number of stocks from various companies.

    • Method Summary

      • addStock

        void addStock(java.lang.String company,
              double amount,
              java.lang.String date,
              double commission)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Method to add a stock to this Portfolio.
        Parameters:
        company - company ticker of the stock to be added
        amount - amount of stock to be added in dollars
        date - date of purchase of stock in yyyy-MM-dd format
        commission - commission for this investment to be added to cost basis
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Method to set DollarCostAveraged to true when Dollar cost strategy is applied to this portfolio.
        Parameters:
